sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Pagination } from 'antd' import { localStorageGet, localStorageSet } from '../../../../../../StorageGS'; import './index.scss' export default class index extends React.Component { state = { keyword: '', page: 1, web_game: [], card: [], media_bangumi: [], media_ft: [], bili_user: [], user: [], star: [], video: [], numberPages: 0, pageNumber: 1 } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.props.location) let keyword = this.props.location.search.slice(9) let pageNumber = this.state.pageNumber this.setState({ keyword }) this.setPageinfo(keyword, pageNumber) } setPageinfo = (keyword, page) => { const _this = this axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/searchresults', { params: { keyword, page } }) .then(function(response) { console.log(response) _this.setState({ web_game: response.data.data.result[1].data, card: response.data.data.result[2].data, media_bangumi: response.data.data.result[3].data, media_ft: response.data.data.result[4].data, bili_user: response.data.data.result[5].data, user: response.data.data.result[6].data, star: response.data.data.result[7].data, video: response.data.data.result[8].data, numberPages: response.data.data.numPages }) }) .catch(function(err) { console.log(err) }) } // 将视频时间戳转换成对应时间格式 gettime = (ns) => { var date=new Date(parseInt(ns)* 1000) var year=date.getFullYear() var mon = date.getMonth()+1 var day = date.getDate() return year + '-' + mon + '-' + day } // 将观看数量转换单位 getwatch = (number) => { if(number > 10000) { let kilo = number / 10000 return kilo.toFixed(1) + "万" }else { return number } } // 用户换页操作 进行当前页数的更改与对应页面的请求 changePage = (page, pageSize) => { this.setState({ pageNumber: page, page: 2 }) let keyword = this.state.keyword console.log(keyword) this.setPageinfo(keyword, page) } render() { const { web_game,card, media_bangumi, media_ft, bili_user, user, star, video, numberPages, pageNumber,page } = this.state return (
    { (web_game || []).map((game) => { return(
  • 游戏 { game.game_name }
    玩家评分: { game.grade } 分

    平台: Android、ios

    游戏简介：{ game.summary }

    下载
    评价 ({ this.getwatch(game.comment_num) }条)
    • ) }) }
    { (media_bangumi || []).map((bangumi) => { return(
  • 独家
    番剧 {/* 碧蓝航线 */} {/* { bangumi.title } */}
    风格: { bangumi.styles }
    地区: { bangumi.areas }
    开播时间: { bangumi.fix_pubtime_str }
    声优: { bangumi.cv }
    { bangumi.desc }
      { (bangumi.eps).map((count, index) => { return(
    • { index + 1 }
      • ) }) }
    { bangumi.media_score.score } 分
    { this.getwatch(bangumi.media_score.user_count) }人点评
    • ) }) }
    { bili_user.map((user) => { return(
    { user.uname } 已关注
    稿件: { user.videos } 粉丝: { this.getwatch(user.fans) }
    { user.official_verify.desc }
    { (user.res).map((info) => { return(
    { info.title } { this.gettime(info.pubdate) }
    ) }) } 全部{user.videos}个稿件>
    ) }) }
    { video.map((videoInfo) => { return(
  • { videoInfo.typename }
    复刻，性价比挺高的（狗头）
    { this.getwatch(videoInfo.play) } 0 { this.gettime(videoInfo.pubdate) } { videoInfo.author }
    • ) }) }
); } }
